website_summaries.verdict: Sleeks looks and sleek engineering make this ice bucket a joy to look at and use.
pros: Unique square design sets this model apart from other ice buckets
The convenient garnish tray that fits inside is a nice bonus for preparing cocktails in a hurry
cons: Dimensions were too small for some customers
They wanted the bucket to be larger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this ice bucket it's made of thick plastic. worked well for keeping ice, much better then those hotel/motel ones lol I returned it though because I thought it would be airtight and it's not.
customer_reviews.author: ANN🌹

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: We don't go through a lot of ice, but having some available for company without the need to be in and out of the freezer was nice. We still had cubes the following morning, so about 18 hours after the bucket was filled. Didn't think it would hold up that well with just a plastic lid but it was a delightful surprise. The tongs being able to hook onto the side kept them out of the way and the garnish tray was nice for our limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: I really like this ice bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I bought this for my wife to place in the guest Bedroom at the new ranch house. Don’t ask me why, but she figured our guest might need a drink or two after spending time with me at the ranch. Anyway, I’ve been sneaking this thing out onto the back porch in the evenings to hold some extra ice for my sippin bourbon. I love sittin on the back porch in the evening and enjoying a glass or two while watching the cattle from a comfortable chair. Don’t judge! Usually, all of my ice melts from the South Texas heat, but this little ice bucket holds the ice up pretty darn nice!
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than it appears in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: This ice bucket is fine of you only need ice for 4 to 6 people. It's much smaller than it appears in the picture. I was shocked when I opened the box. My fault for not checking the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Neat but small
customer_reviews.text: First, my fault for not reading the dimensions. From the photos, I really thought it would be bigger. I was hosting a 40th birthday backyard party and figured this would be great for my cocktail station. Turns out, even being small- it worked out. This thing kept ice for several hours. I mean, It doesn't hold a lot obviously, but it's well insulated. I'm sure I will get a lot of use out of this the rest of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Scillieri

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and functional
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new ice bucket and this one is great. Convenient handle on the side to store the tongs. Easy storage, tongs fit inside and cleaning is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: TaraC

customer_reviews.title: Great ice bucket!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great ice bucket! I like the size, which is perfect for my home bar, and the convenience of having the lemons and limes in a small container that can be kept inside the bucket to remain chilled until ready to be served. The tongs work well and can be kept hanging right next to the bucket on either side. I definitely recommend this ice bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Rewster

customer_reviews.title: The best ice bucket to keep ice whole & not melting.
customer_reviews.text: Really great--the ice stays ice even overnight! Tongs & a place inside to keep other small items cold--you can use that little attachment inside or not.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee B

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts half a day
customer_reviews.text: I got this bucket to hold ice for a drink station I set up in my basement work-from-home office. I fill it up with ice from the freezer in the morning, and by mid-afternoon it's pretty much all melted. The grooves in the bottom for meltwater are completely inadequate since they are so wide that the ice easily falls into the grooves. The tongs that hang off the side are a nice touch. Overall, it's fine, it mostly does what I needed it to. Just wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: tongs and garnish tray are great. Looks classy and arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Double wall, tongs and garnish tray are great. Looks classy and arrived quickly. Wish I would have bought earlier than later. I's the size you need for a 20 person party or so but may have to fill a second time.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ice bucket!
customer_reviews.text: After many years of borrowing my parents ice bucket for all of the gatherings we host, I finally decided it was time to buy my own. This ice bucket is everything I wanted! It’s a good size and held plenty of ice. Love that it comes with a tray that can be used inside to keep garnishes cool or sits outside nicely. Tongs are sturdy and seem like they will hold up well. All around great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Please with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect ice bucket. Lid is always accessible. The tongs hang and STAY on the side on the hinge. It holds a nice amount of ice and the well at the bottom keeps melted water off of the ice. It’s a stylish accessory for any gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Hound Mum

customer_reviews.title: Shape, Weight and Function are great
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight ice bucket did an awesome job keeping our ice in solid form and its square shape kept if from taking up too much room on the drink table. The scoop is handy and although we didn't need the garnish tray this time it's great to have as an option.
customer_reviews.author: ImABeliever

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, but you really can't use the accessory dish in it, because there really is not as much internal space as I imagined. Kept ice frozen for extended period, but had to be refilled quickly as we kept running out.
customer_reviews.author: takncarabizniz

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: The tongs hang on the side. As the ice melts the water collects in the bottom of the bucket, but the ice stays above the water because of the construction of the bucket. I can store lemon and lime slices in the small tray
customer_reviews.author: diver46

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Cool..
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, easy to use, small ice bucket. the drain grid at the bottom is a good feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M. Young

customer_reviews.title: any plastic container can do the same job
customer_reviews.text: id be better off buying a 62 ounce REAL Thermos to hold my ice. this thing is not totally insulated, the top is one sheet of plastic. it has a handle for easy carrying, tongs and a lemon lime tray its supposed to wick away melt water but well, it really does not
customer_reviews.author: William Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Just okay!
customer_reviews.text: The bucket size is much smaller than I expected. It also sweats ALOT more than any other bucket I have purchased. I would not buy this again. It is worth it to spend more money!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent in lockdown
customer_reviews.text: This was a no brainer for a review, the things actually has NO condensation and I live in the Caribbean so you can imagine the humidity, it kept ice with no melting for a couple hours comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Clarity Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Bucket
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice to have ice easily available when having a family gathering. The tongs are handy- hanging on the side of the bucket. I like the design of the ice bucket too. The garnish tray for lemons and such is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy N.

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep ice frozen
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep the ice very well, it is attractive that is it. The bottom has a design in it, that is hard to clean. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great ice bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice bucket. Holds a lot. Love the tray for lemons and really, really love that the tongs hang on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Island Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. My mom likes it a lot. It is sturdy, looks nice and keeps ice from melting. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C Rus

customer_reviews.title: Great ice bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use by my pool and Ice stayed cold all day in 90 degree weather. I love The small tray for my lemons!
customer_reviews.author: Kat F.

customer_reviews.title: Best ice bucket !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice double wall so no condensation dropped on my table. Good side. not large but not too small. Could be larger, but good for a small get together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good way to keep the freezer closed!
customer_reviews.text: This holds enough ice that we only have to load it once in the morning and then fill our vacuum insulated cups through the day. We use the leftover melted ice to refill out Keurig the next morning or water a few plants.
customer_reviews.author: Fred B.

customer_reviews.title: Okay for short term usage
customer_reviews.text: Not as insulated as I thought when I purchased it. My 2" square ice cubes are completely melted after 2-2 1/2 hours inside my air-conditioned house. I think that the thin plastic lid is the weak point. it does look nice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Silva

customer_reviews.title: NICE QUALITY AND SIZE.
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME ICE BUCKET!! NICE SIZE AND QUALITY. I HAD BEEN LOOKING FOR 2 CHRISTMASES ON AMAZON FOR A GOOD QUALITY ICE BUCKET AS A GIFT. DID NOT WANT TO PAY A FORTUNE EITHER. EVEN AT LOCAL STORES I COULD NOT FIND ONE. SO HAPOY WITH THIS ONE. IT MADE AN AWESOME GIFT!!
customer_reviews.author: denise breaux

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ice Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Nice bucket. Like the lid. Especially like the rings. Holds a nice supply of ice for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. The ice melts but not as fast as ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. The ice melts but not as fast as it would be in a normal bucket. The only problem I had was with the washing of the product. I thought the inside container was able to remove. Purchased for my husband. Loves it. The only problem is the holder for the pinchers.
customer_reviews.author: Datsun

customer_reviews.title: Keep Ice For a Long time
customer_reviews.text: We used this ice bucket for the first time and the ice lasted all night. It is amazing and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this ice bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice bucket! Kept ice for 8 hours. I left some in the bucket to see how long it would keep as an a experiment, and still had a few cubes in the water the next morning. Love the little tray for lemons and limes. I usually prefer a scoop to useless tongs, but these are big and grab enough to be useful. Refilled once for a party of 12 and had some leftover. I would definitely recommend this ice bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D.

customer_reviews.title: Hey does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a party, kept ice from melting for 5 hours. Only 10-15% of the ice melted during that time frame. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected. Guess I didn’t read the dimensions correctly. Too expensive for size.
customer_reviews.author: Harriette Lavenue

customer_reviews.title: Not a great design
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this ice bucket is great, except....its thermal isolation. Ice metls too quickly. I think it is because the lid on top is not isolated and is a thin plastic cover. So my ice melted too quickly. It replaced my older bucket which was about 20 years before it broke. Older one kept ice for much longer. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amit A.

customer_reviews.title: Ice Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Ice melts faster than I would have hoped. Smaller than I thought too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ice bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Used for outdoor patio...ice stayed perfectly chilled for entire evening. The compartment for limes/lemons was excellent. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Everything is my kitchen is stainless steel so I decided to look for an ice bucket on Amazon and found it. It's nice and compact.. I wish it was taller but, it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool kept ice in it for two days after the party. Love the little grippers.
customer_reviews.author: El&j

customer_reviews.title: Practical ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: Not classic looking but very practical and well designed. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! Love the tongs and the little compartment for lemon or limes. We had ice in it for 3-4 hours with no melting.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the tray for cut up lemons and limes. Nice size for a small party.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory
customer_reviews.text: Well made bucket for our vintage bar! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ice bucket! I use it all the time and it works great. Love the little tray for fruit slices.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my living room bar. Looks nice and not too big
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Works super.
customer_reviews.text: Had it in time for 4th of July party. People kept commenting on well the ice bucket kept the ice from melting. It was good for hours.
customer_reviews.author: webbizy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super nice and clean looking. Keeps ice cold and a great size for gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Get Those Bells Ready
customer_reviews.text: Nicely sized, looks cute and durable. Love the tongs/holder. The garnish tray is a plus that I would never have thought of on my own, and I look forward to using. Guess it's time to throw a party!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT. COMES WITH TONGS AND A SMALL ...
customer_reviews.text: HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT. COMES WITH TONGS AND A SMALL CONDIMENT TRAY THAT FITS INSIDE. KEEPS ICE SOLID FOR A LONG TIME
customer_reviews.author: JEAN S.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive design
customer_reviews.text: So far 5 stars for the attractive design. I've not used it yet so haven't tested out the "double wall" construction.
customer_reviews.author: CMC_CA

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little ice bucket for the money. Needed something rather small for a dry bar. As are all OXO products, this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Busto

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Kept my ice longer than in a bowl and it was easy to carry around due to the handle.
customer_reviews.author: MsBea

customer_reviews.title: Giftable!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and they loved it! Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Litzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Ice didn't melt to fast
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Ice didn't melt to fast, it helps having a hinged lid to keep it closed between uses(since people tend to forget to put the lid back on the other ice buckets)...Had compliments on it over Christmas
customer_reviews.author: droid

customer_reviews.title: I like the bucket but it is a little too small ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the bucket but it is a little too small for larger party's. It's good for a group of six people.
customer_reviews.author: Crusher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Is stylish and keeps ice for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Not sure why—but I thought it was stainless and it isn’t. It’s plastic, but still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Benton

customer_reviews.title: Ice lasts long.
customer_reviews.text: Well insulated. Had ice in it for over 5 hours and still had large cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Works well - love OXO products
customer_reviews.text: Used it at a party recently. Ice lasted for hours.
customer_reviews.author: T210

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. It’s a nice bucket. Holds ice. That’s about it. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great ice bucket, like the fruit tray, keeps everything together
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: N “ICE”
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ice bucket. Makes for a really nice housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: attractive for parties
customer_reviews.text: Sort of small but seems to keep the ice cold. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joni T.

customer_reviews.title: Great ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: Great ice bucket and love the little tray inside for sliced lemon and lime! Great idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gynine Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it kept the ice outdoors in a hot summer day, I would recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a private fundraising event. Worked VERY well.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Yim

customer_reviews.title: I love that the ice doesn’t melt fast
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and that it has a holder for the thong
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay as cold as I'd expected. No insulation to keep ice from melting.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all. My small events. Keeps ice fresh. Holder for tongs is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lady

customer_reviews.title: Ice in a box for hours
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice cold for hours, love the little tray for lemons - cute surprise when guests open. Great for a picnic or party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan in the OC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any get-together
customer_reviews.text: Great little ice bucket. I like that you can put sliced lemons and limes inside too.
customer_reviews.author: konagirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice and small tray of extras cold. Nice spot to hang the tongs on.
customer_reviews.author: Strgzr5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small dinner parties.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Insulation from condensation isn't 100% but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Can hold and keeps ice cold for hours and looks good doing it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received as displayed in the add. A great addition to my mini bar and it's portable, so it can go where the action is.
customer_reviews.author: Cap Foster

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: iT says double wall but the ice melts fast so the insulation factor it nill; a hotel ice buctet works beter than this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Seeber

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, great for ice and lemon slices. Love the extras it came with.
customer_reviews.author: scott powell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I wanted but nice product and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Ah

customer_reviews.title: Has it all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a New Years Eve party. Worked out very well, and is small enough to store in small spaces when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked if the inner bucket could be removed and put in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Chi grl

customer_reviews.title: ... I gave it as a gift and the receiver liked
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was looking for but I gave it as a gift and the receiver liked it
customer_reviews.author: Sue Schiller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, keeps ice cold over night and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ice from melting for at least 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Great for parties, especially if you’re into serving bourbon/whiskey on the rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkaddict

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little ice holder at an even awesomer price :)
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: This is good for a small party
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be bigger. This is good for a small party, but not a large one.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little ice bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new apartment with a teeny tiny freezer and no room for ice cube trays. Luckily, I have access to the building's ice cube machine and so I needed an ice bucket. Perfect in every way, easy to clean, and looks great. Wish the tongs could store away somehow inside or on it, but other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Marian K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: Love the garnish tray inside and well as the reservoir at the base...I bought two of them. They are nice to have by the pool or backyard get together.
customer_reviews.author: Seraphim

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ice solid long time
customer_reviews.text: Love it for a party. Has a tong hanging on the side and the dish for lemons and limes. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ1971

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, functional, clever
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a perfect ice bucket but it fit my needs perfectly. I needed to have a good-looking bucket to sit on my bar while making a video series that would also give me easy access to ice. Finding this one that also includes the small tray for things like citrus wedges was very lucky. Being OXO it's well-designed of course. There's no condensation on the outside thanks to its insulation and opening the lid to remove the ice it very easy. I'm not crazy about the tongs, but I have a pair that came with a bar set that works just fine. For a basic, well-made ice bucket I don't think you can go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have used this at several parties and it works great. The lemon/lime holder is a nice touch. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Snider

customer_reviews.title: Best ice bucket ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to our bar and I love the little garnish tray.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Losli

customer_reviews.title: Finally a company that delivers
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. looks great and works great
customer_reviews.author: Fat Tire Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice ice bucket, but does not hold ice for as long as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Cate

customer_reviews.title: I love this ice bucket so much my family members and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice bucket so much my family members and friends have borrowed it for their own parties! Love the tray for garnish and that the tongs are included and have a docking spot! Great unit!
customer_reviews.author: kjr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket and it comes with tongs and a place for lemons too.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Must be better buckets out there.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not keep ice as long as I would have hoped given the price. But it was usable. That is until the inside cracked. Would not buy again, and likely would not purchase another OXO product. Have been happy with their brand and quality in the past, but this product is simply not worth their name or the premium price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Boataholic

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these for a First Communion party of about 65 people. We had most drinks sitting in iced coolers so there was not super high demand for ice -- both there was some -- and this served us well. It kept ice solid for at least four hours -- maybe five or more. I read a review that said there was no place to hang the tongs. The picture shows you clearly where the tongs hang. They hang pretty snugly there. I was needlessly worried about this until the buckets arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Irishlawlass

customer_reviews.title: Cute lil bucket
customer_reviews.text: Nice small ice bucket. Works well for me and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: T. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Handy and useful ice bucket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ice bucket to use with our weekly church group. It is just the right size for 12-16 people and keeps ice cold for a couple of hours. The tongs are not flimsy and are easy to use. I love the insert tray and use this for lemon slices. A great value and very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Fun2mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.  Looks great.  Could have better insulation.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Looks great, nice features. Would be nice if it was insulated, but it keeps ice for ~30 min in hot weather. (I'd have given it 5 stars if it had some better insulation than just the air gap.)
customer_reviews.author: C. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out design.  Looks nice on the bar.
customer_reviews.text: This little bucket works well. The melt-water is kept off of the cubes, and the double-wall plastic keeps the bucket from sweating onto the bar or table. Be aware, this is a standard (read: small) ice bucket, that holds enough ice for 6-8 drinks, much the same as you would see in a hotel room. The tongs work OK, and they easily clip onto either side of the bucket when not in use. A great idea.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sweeney

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Double Wall Ice Bucket with Tongs and Garnish Tray,Gray
product_meta.description:
Be prepared for any party, inside or out, with this insulated Ice Bucket. Includes nylon tongs that hang conveniently from either side and a removable tray that holds drink garnishes. The carrying handle stays out of the way when not in use and the reservoir keeps meltwater away from cubes.

BRAND STORY
By OXO
feature_bullets: Removable garnish tray rests inside Bucket to keep garnishes chilled and protected
Convenient carrying handle stays out of the way when not in use
Nylon tongs with sharp teeth easily scoop and grab ice
Tongs hang from either side of bucket for convenient storage
Internal reservoir keeps meltwater away from cubes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars854 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
